AppTive

Taurus SC

Taurus SC lwith 9.1% Fipronil (the same amount of a.i. as the popular Termidor SC) provides best-in-class control of termites, ants and a wide variety of other insect pests including spiders, roaches, ticks and many more. The active ingredient is Fipronil.

Fipronil works by disrupting the normal function of the central nervous system in insects. Fipronil is more toxic to insects than people and pets because it is more likely to bind to insect nerve endings.

    Target Pests:
  • Ants (acrobat, argentine, big-headed, carpenter, pavement, pharaoh, thief)
  • Cockroaches (australian, oriental, smoky brown)
  • Crickets
  • Earwigs
  • Fleas
  • Flies
  • Mosquitos
  • Silverfish
  • Spiders (black widow, brown recluse, cellar, hobo)
  • Springtails
  • Ticks (brown, dog)
